testCases.label: Test finding max in a small, sorted array
testCases.description: Verifies that the max value '4' is correctly identified in the array {0, 1, 2, 3, 4}.

testCases.label: Test finding max in a mixed order array
testCases.description: Verifies that the max value '10' is correctly identified in the array {9, 8, 10, 3, 4}.

testCases.label: Test finding max in an array of negative integers
testCases.description: Verifies that the largest negative value, '-45', is correctly identified in the array {-100, -383, -45, -901, -76}.
